name: Quizzical59: Easy Word Search6 | Brain Teasers | 25 Questions

questions.text: To remove the fleece of a sheep by cutting or clipping may cause disheartenment?
questions.explanation:
Shear & shear.

	diSHEARtenment. Shear is to remove the fleece of sheep by cutting or clipping.

questions.text: The Ukraine is notorious for its precipitation from clouds in the form of droplets of water?
questions.explanation:
Rain & rain.

	ukRAINe. Rain is precipitation from clouds in the form of drops of water.

questions.text: A cutting weapon with a long blade is found in a crossword puzzle?
questions.explanation:
Sword & sword.

	crosSWORD. A sword is a cutting weapon with a long blade.

questions.text: The Brazilian Formula One driver, Rubens Barrichello, attracts attention in the form of an expression of greeting?
questions.explanation:
Hello & hello.

	barricHELLO. Hello is the expression of greeting.

questions.text: Permit Halloween to go ahead?
questions.explanation:
Allow & allow.

	hALLOWeen. To permit is to allow.

questions.text: Does the male sovereign prince rule Buckingham Palace?
questions.explanation:
King & king.

	bucKINGham. A king is a male sovereign prince.

questions.text: Does Charlton, the actor, appear in 'The Sword and the Stone'?
questions.explanation:
Heston & heston.

	tHE STONe. Actor Charlton Heston.

questions.text: Is Steven Spielberg associated with a glib, plausible style of talk like that of a salesman?
questions.explanation:
Spiel & spiel.

	SPIELberg. Spiel is a glib, plausible style of talk associated with a salesman.

questions.text: The television programme 'Dynasty' is unpleasant if not offensive?
questions.explanation:
Nasty & nasty.

	dyNASTY. Nasty is unpleasant or offensive.

questions.text: The craft of upholstering makes a sheathlike leather case for a pistol?
questions.explanation:
Holster & holster.

	upHOLSTERing. A holster is a sheathlike leather case for a pistol.

questions.text: A narration of a chain of events is now history?
questions.explanation:
Story & story.

	hiSTORY. A story is a narration of a chain of events.

questions.text: The archaic or poetic word for silver originates from Argentina?
questions.explanation:
Argent & argent.

	ARGENTina. Argent is the archaic or poetic word for silver.

questions.text: Comanche Indians settled at a sultanate in South-East Arabia?
questions.explanation:
Oman & oman.

	cOMANche. Oman is the sultanate of South-East Arabia.

questions.text: Knowledge or learning is found in Florence, Italy?
questions.explanation:
Lore & lore.

	fLOREnce. Lore is knowledge or learning.

questions.text: Does Kriss Kringle descend down the fireplace at Christmas?
questions.explanation:
Ingle & ingle.

	krINGLE. An ingle is a fireplace. Kriss Kringle is another name for Father Christmas or Santa Claus.

questions.text: Who is the vagrant who settled at a city in Northern India and the location of the Taj Mahal?
questions.explanation:
Agra & agra.

	vAGRAnt. Agra is the city in Northern India and location of the Taj Mahal.

questions.text: I want to be very keen and enthusiastic like the magician David Copperfield?
questions.explanation:
Avid & avid.

	dAVID. Avid is to be very keen and enthusiastic.

questions.text: Is the British sculptor Damien, bloodthirsty?
questions.explanation:
Hirst & hirst.

	bloodtHIRSTy. Controversial British sculptor who won the 1995 Turner Prize by exhibiting sculptures of animals preserved in formaldehyde.

questions.text: This diving bird of northern oceans has a heavy body with black and white plumage and comes from Milwaukee?
questions.explanation:
Auk & auk.

	milwAUKee. Auk is the diving bird from northern oceans having a heavy body and black and white plumage.

questions.text: Silverstone provides the Russian unit of length?
questions.explanation:
Verst & verst.

	silVERSTone. Verst is the Russian unit of length equal to 0.6629 miles.

questions.text: This group of three islands in the Atlantic Ocean are guaranteed to be found off the west coast of Ireland?
questions.explanation:
Aran & aran.

	guARANteed. The Aran Islands are a group of three islands in the Atlantic off the West coast of Ireland.

questions.text: Rita needs educating about the former gold or silver coins from Italy or the Netherlands?
questions.explanation:
Ducat & ducat.

	eDUCATing. Ducat were former gold or silver coins from Italy or the Netherlands.

questions.text: Did the daughter of Zeus and Hera and the wife of Hercules, star in the film 'The Beguiled' with Clint Eastwood?
questions.explanation:
Hebe & hebe.

	tHE BEguiled. Hebe in Greek Mythology was the daughter of Zeus and Hera and the wife of Hercules.

questions.text: A notch on an arrow that fits on the bowstring is a knockout in archery?
questions.explanation:
Nock & nock.

	kNOCKout. Nock is a notch on an arrow that fits on the bowstring.

questions.text: This stone or other small object is believed to protect the wearer from evil influences because Nicaragua's capital is Managua?
questions.explanation:
Talisman & talisman.

	capiTAL IS MANagua. A talisman is a stone or other small object believed to protect the wearer from evil influences. Hope you enjoyed the word search. If you find any alternative answers, please let me know. Cheers.
